name: Soul of Las Borpas
description:
SOUL OF LAS BORPAS

A Meme Noir Visual Novel

by

Team Citizens Under Moon

made for

MoonJam 2022: Q1 - FACADE

Programming: @deadpixelsociety

Music/Writing: @ICWobbles

Art: @itsmuffnbuttn

You are John Souls, Private Dick, and someone just murdered reclusive criminal mastermind Maximilian Thoroughbred. You awaken to a call requesting your presence at the scene. Can you unravel the mystery of who killed Yung Dab?
